analysis.description: CTV.isContract (/unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol#231-247) is declared view but contains assembly code

CTV.startSale (/unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol#215-223) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(startTime == 0)
_empty in CTV.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol#316) is a local variable never initialiazed
_empty in CTV.transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol#265) is a local variable never initialiazed

CTV.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- investorAddress.transfer(investorStruct.weiReceived) (/unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol#541-542)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/15/0xab857d8a2c8d743f0184ddc3ca184904afa66673.sol#1): it allows old versions
